purpose: To enable seamless communication and data exchange between Apify Actors using the Model Context Protocol.
principle: Built on the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to standardize interactions and data sharing among distributed actors.
reusability: Offers a standardized API for integration with Apify's ecosystem, enabling plug-and-play functionality with existing actors.
limitations: Primarily designed for use within the Apify platform; may not support non-Apify environments. Still in alpha, so subject to significant changes.
name: actors-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server for Apify's Actors
highlight: Facilitates communication between Apify Actors using the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for enhanced interoperability.
